Text.p: The intergalactic hyperdrive is expensive and can be obtained only from planets at Tech level 10 or higher. It can only be used once, and will take you to a system in a whole new galaxy (i.e. a new galactic chart). There are 8 such galaxies and making 8 jumps will return you to your starting galaxy. The intergalactic hyperdrive is engaged by pressing the button shown above, which can be found on the second button page on the right hand side.
